text: Álvaro Joaquim de Melo Siza Vieira, (born 25 June 1933), is a Portuguese architect, and architectural educator. He is internationally known as Álvaro Siza () and in Portugal as Siza Vieira (). In 1992, he won the Pritzker Architecture Prize.Pritzker Architecture Prize: Alvaro Siza Vieira , retrieved 1 May 2011. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese architects Category:Portuguese educators
title: Álvaro Siza Vieira
